name: StickBumps
description:
This game has 2 mode. One is Story Mode which you play in Single Player and complete the story. The other one is PvP Mode when you have to have another player and fight to the death to win.

Right now Story Mode is not finish yet so only PvP mode is in the game right now. Mobile version isn't out yet.

Music by Evan King. You should give him a sub just saying...

Evan Channel Link Here: https://www.youtube.com/EvanKingaudio
